category.title: Troubleshooting Issues
category.description: Having a problem interacting with your ETH or tokens? Is your Ledger or TREZOR not working as expected? Find solutions to a variety of issues here.

childrenCategory.title: Accessing Your Wallet
childrenCategory.description: Encountering any problems when accessing your wallet? Here are some articles to help you out.

childMdx.excerpt: For instructions on connecting to your own local Ethereum node with MyCrypto, please see  this  article. Verify the URL you entered is correct. Verify the port you entered is correct. Verify that if you are connecting to an http:// node, you are running MyCrypto locally (NOT over https://). Verify you are running with: Geth:  geth --rpc --rpccorsdomain "*" Parity:  parity --jsonrpc-cors "*" You can also run both clients in light client mode, which only downloads the recent state of theâ€¦
